Job Description: Software Development Engineer Place: Mumbai,  Andheri(W) Apply Experience: 1 to 4 years of industry experience CTC: As per Industry Standards Key Skills: We're looking for people who are smart and can make things happen. - Solid experience in C# or VC++. - Solid expertise in Data Structures and Algorithms. - Solid understanding of Object Oriented design and concepts. - Great understanding of database theory and solid experience in at least one relational DBMS. - Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills. - Obsession with quality and customer experience -  Attention to detail coupled with ability to think abstractly. - Experience with scaling and performance of large systems Qualification: Bachelors or Masters Degree in Computer Science or related field Specialization: Big Data Analytics Job Function: Software Developer Job Description - The successful candidate is expected to contribute to all parts of the software development and deployment lifecycle,  including design,  development,  documentation,  testing and operations. - They must possess strong verbal and written communication skills,  be self- driven and deliver high quality results in a fast paced environment.
